aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.intro: Hi, I'm Priscilla ! Passionate about software development, I started self-learning a few years ago by creating my first projects. This allowed me to acquire skills in front-end, back-end, databases, and project management. Curious, I'm also interested in data and management information systems.
aboutme.career: In 2024, I decided to strengthen my learning by joining a web developer training course at OpenClassrooms to structure and deepen my knowledge. This career change is the culmination of a passion I've decided to turn into a profession.
aboutme.experience: Before that, I spent 15 years in sales, including 8 years as a technical sales manager, where I developed skills in communication, organization, and project management.
aboutme.what_i_like: What I enjoy? Learning, tackling technical challenges, and evolving in a constantly changing field.
